messages.title: Local people want change
messages.content: Only Mark Wilkes can end 75 years of Labour neglect here

messages.title: LABOUR MP HAS LET US DOWN..!
messages.content: Angry local residents say 'Only Lib Dem Mark Wilkes can beat Labour here.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: LIB DEMS MAKE REAL PROMISE ON HEALTH.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Lib Dem Mark Wilkes can beat Labour here.

issues.environment: Our Labour MP voted to close our breath-testing services.
issues.governance: We deserve better. Only Mark Wilkes and the Lib Dems offer real change.

politicalExperience.achievements: Mark and the Lib Dems fought tooth and nail to protect our amenities and voted to stop the double tax for those on the lowest incomes.

images.caption: Mark Wilkes with a Liberal Democrats sign
Post box with information about voting to close post offices
Woman indicating distress, related to fuel poverty failure

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet accuses Labour MP 's huge expenses claims, closing post offices, and fuel poverty failure, presenting Mark Wilkes as an alternative. The leaflet also accuses the Labour MP for following the Labour line in Westminster and failing to speak out for our community.
